properties.name: richtext_label_6
properties.text: Please note that all Caterpillar Hose/Couplings & Cylinders being Installed, Repaired, Serviced and/or Replaced with non-genuine Caterpillar parts/components or any services provided to William Adams by an external hydraulics vendor must be approved, at a minimum, by the branch manager.
properties.textTranslation: Please note that all Caterpillar Hose/Couplings & Cylinders being Installed, Repaired, Serviced and/or Replaced with non-genuine Caterpillar parts/components or any services provided to William Adams by an external hydraulics vendor must be approved, at a minimum, by the branch manager.

properties.name: richtext_label_7
properties.text:
Final Approval Levels as Listed below by value of this request
​$0.00 ​to ​$1,000.00 ​Branch Manager Operations
​$1,000.00 ​to ​$5,000.00 ​Area Manager Operations
​ ​Above ​$5,000.00 ​General Manager Operations
